questions.radio-options: Index Case Household, Index Case Neighbors, Mass Screen
questions.action_on_change: if (ResultOfQuestion('MalariaCaseID') is null and value is 'Mass Screen') then $('[name=MalariaCaseID]').val(moment().format('YYMD') + Math.floor(Math.random()*100000))
questions.label: Reason for visiting household

questions.validation: ($('#398').val('');return 'Shehia ' + value + ' is not valid. Please try again.' ) unless _.contains(window.ShehiaOptions, value)
questions.label: Shehia

questions.skip_logic: if window.currentCase then not(window.currentCase.indexCaseHasNoTravelHistory() and window.currentCase.highRiskShehia()) else true
questions.label: Household in high risk shehia and index case has no travel history, recommend followup at nearby households
Number of other households within 50 steps of index case household

questions.validation: return 'Value must be between 0 and 20' if value < 0 or value > 20
questions.label: Total Number of Residents in the Household

questions.validation: return 'Value must be between 0 and 20' if value < 0 or value > 20

questions.validation: return 'Value must be between 0 and 20' if value < 0 or value > 20
questions.label: Number of Sleeping Places (beds/mattresses)
Have you given coupon(s) for nets

questions.validation: return 'Value must be between 0 and 20' if value < 0 or value > 20
questions.label: Number of Household Members with Fever or History of Fever Within Past Week

questions.validation: return 'Value must be between 0 and 20' if value < 0 or value > 20
questions.label: Number of Household Members Treated for Malaria Within Past Week
Index case: If patient is female 15-45 years of age, is she is pregant?

questions.radio-options: Feeling Better, Feeling Unchanged, Feeling Worse, Admitted, Died
questions.label: Index case: Patient's current status
Index case: Slept under LLIN last night?
Overnight Travel within Zanzibar 10-24 days before positive test result
questions.action_on_questions_loaded: _.delay( (-> start = moment(currentCase.indexCaseDiagnosisDate()).subtract(24,'days').format('Do of MMM, YYYY');end = moment(currentCase.indexCaseDiagnosisDate()).subtract(10,'days').format('Do of MMM, YYYY');$('label[for=3768]').html($('label[for=3768]').html().replace(/Zanzibar.*/, 'Zanzibar between the ' + start + ' and ' + end))), 2000)

questions.label: List all locations of overnight travel within Zanzibar 10-24 days before positive test result
questions.action_on_questions_loaded: _.delay( (-> start = moment(currentCase.indexCaseDiagnosisDate()).subtract(24,'days').format('Do of MMM, YYYY');end = moment(currentCase.indexCaseDiagnosisDate()).subtract(10,'days').format('Do of MMM, YYYY');$('label[for=3769]').html($('label[for=3769]').html().replace(/Zanzibar.*/, 'Zanzibar between the ' + start + ' and ' + end))), 2000)
